trans-unit.source: An error occurred
trans-unit.target: Ina errur è capitada

trans-unit.source: What's the matter?
trans-unit.target: Tge è il problem?

trans-unit.source: How can I fix the issue?
trans-unit.target: Co pos jau schliar il problem?

trans-unit.source: Tell me more, please
trans-unit.target: Dapli infurmaziuns!

trans-unit.source: To customize this notice, create a custom template file named %s.
trans-unit.target: Per persunalisar quest errur pos ti crear in template persunalisà cun il num %s.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing this script. Something does not work properly.
trans-unit.target: Ina errur è cumparida durant exequir quest script. Insatge na funcziunescha betg correctamain.

trans-unit.source: Open the system/logs/error.log file and find the associated error message (usually the last one). You can also add the following line to the local configuration file and reload this page:
trans-unit.target: Avra la datoteca system/logs/error.log e tschertga l'errur correspundenta (per ordinari l'ultima). Ti pos era agiuntar la suandanta lingia a tia datoteca da configuraziun locala e rechargiar questa pagina:

trans-unit.source: However, please be aware that anyone will be able to see error messages on your website then!
trans-unit.target: Ti stos dentant esser conscient che mintgin vegn ad esser abel da vesair ils messadis d'errur sin tia pagina!

trans-unit.source: The script execution stopped, because something does not work properly. The actual error message is hidden by this notice for security reasons and can be found in in the system/logs/error.log file (see above). If you do not understand the error message or do not know how to fix the problem, search the Contao FAQs or visit the Contao support page.
trans-unit.target: L'execuziun dal script è vegnì interrut perquai ch'insatge na funcziuna betg correctamain. Ord motivs da segirezza vegn il messadi d'errur remplazzà entras quest messadi. Il messadi po vegnir chattà en la datoteca system/logs/error.log (mira sura). Sche ti na chapeschas betg il messadi u na sas betg co schliar il problem pos ti leger las Dumondas frequentas davart Contao u che ti pos visitar la Pagina d'agid da Contao.

trans-unit.source: Invalid request token
trans-unit.target: Token da dumonda nunvalid

trans-unit.source: The request token could not be verified.
trans-unit.target: Il token da dumonda na pudeva betg vegnir verifitgà.

trans-unit.source: Please click this link and try again. Do not use the back button of your browser.
trans-unit.target: Clicca sin questa colliaziun ed emprova danovamain. N'utilisescha betg il buttun enavos da tes navigatur.

trans-unit.source: This error occurs if there is a POST request without a valid authentication token. In Contao 2.10, the referer check has been replaced with a request token system. If the problem persists, you may be using an incompatible third-party extension or have not correctly updated your Contao installation.
trans-unit.target: Questa errur capita sch'ina dumonda da POST vegn tramessa senza in token d'autentificaziun valid. En Contao 2.10 è la controlla da renviament vegnida remplazzada entras in sistem da tokens da dumondas. Sche quest problem resta utiliseschas ti eventualmain extensiuns da terz che n'èn betg cumpatiblas u che ti n'has betg actualisà correctamain tia installaziun da Contao.

trans-unit.source: For more information, search the Contao FAQs or visit the Contao support page.
trans-unit.target: Dapli infurmaziuns chattas ti en las Dumondas frequentas davart Contao u che ti pos visitar la Pagina d'agid da Contao.

trans-unit.source: Incomplete installation
trans-unit.target: Installaziun betg cumpletta

trans-unit.source: The installation has not been completed, therefore Contao cannot work properly.
trans-unit.target: L'installaziun n'è betg vegnida cumplettada, perquai na funcziunescha Contao betg correctamain.

trans-unit.source: Point your browser to the following URL:
trans-unit.target: Avra suandanta URL en tes navigatur:

trans-unit.source: path-to-installation
trans-unit.target: percurs-a-la-installaziun

trans-unit.source: This will open the Contao install tool, which will guide you through the installation process.
trans-unit.target: Quai vegn ad avrir l'utensil d'installaziun da Contao che ta guida entras il process d'installaziun.

trans-unit.source: For more information, please refer to the Contao manual.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriuras infurmaziuns pos ti leger il Manual da Contao.

trans-unit.source: Page not found
trans-unit.target: Betg chattà la pagina

trans-unit.source: The page you have requested does not exist under this domain.
trans-unit.target: La pagina che ti has dumandà n'exista betg u na pudeva betg vegnir chattada sin questa domain.

trans-unit.source: Try to go to the top level and use the search function (if any) to find the page you were looking for. You may also contact the webmaster and let him know that there is something wrong.
trans-unit.target: Emprova da visitar l'emprim livel ed dad utilisar (sche disponibel) la funcziun da tschertgar per chattar la pagina che ti tschertgar. Ti pos era contactar il webmaster ed infurmar el ch'insatge na funcziunescha betg correctamain.

trans-unit.source: Forward page not found
trans-unit.target: Betg chattà la pagina da renviar

trans-unit.source: The application has been configured to forward the request to another page, however, the target page does not exist or has not been published.
trans-unit.target: L'applicaziun è vegnida configurada da renviar questa dumonda sin in'autra pagina. La destinaziun n'exista dentant betg u n'è betg publitgada.

trans-unit.source: This is something that needs to be fixed by the administrator of the website. If you are a visitor, there is nothing you can do except to contact the webmaster to let him know that there is something wrong.
trans-unit.target: Quai è in problem che sto vegnir schlià da l'administratur da la pagina d'internet. Sche ti ès in visitader na pos ti far nagut auter che contactar il webmaster ed infurmar el ch'insatge n'è betg correct.

trans-unit.source: No root page found
trans-unit.target: Chattà nagina ragisch da pagina

trans-unit.source: There is no website root page which matches the requested language and/or domain name.
trans-unit.target: I n'exista nagina ragisch da pagina che correspunda a la lingua e/u domain.

trans-unit.source: If you have explicitly set a language, try to go to the top level and see whether you are being redirected. Otherwise contact the webmaster and let him know that there is something wrong.
trans-unit.target: Sche ti has tschernì explicitamain ina lingua, pos ti visitar l'emprim livel e guardar sche ti vegns renvià. Uschiglio pos ti contactar il webmaster ed infurmar el ch'insatge na funcziunescha betg correctamain.

trans-unit.source: No layout specified
trans-unit.target: Specifitgà nagin layout.

trans-unit.source: The page you have requested has not yet been associated with a page layout.
trans-unit.target: La pagina che ti has dumandà n'è betg vegnida associada cun in layout da pagina.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you have assigned a page layout to each website root page in the site structure.
trans-unit.target: Controllescha che ti has assignà in layout da pagina a mintga ragisch da pagina en la structura da pagina

trans-unit.source: For more information, please refer to the Contao manual.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriuras infurmaziuns pos ti leger il Manual da Contao.

trans-unit.source: No active pages found
trans-unit.target: Chattà naginas paginas activas

trans-unit.source: Your request has been mapped to a website which does not yet contain any published pages.
trans-unit.target: Tia dumonda pertutga ina pagina d'internet che na cuntegnan naginas paginas publitgadas.

trans-unit.source: Most likely, the website is still under development and will be online in a few days. If you still think that there is something wrong, contact the webmaster and let him know.
trans-unit.target: Probablamain è la pagina d'internet anc adina en svilup è vegn per ad esser online en in per dis. Sche ti pensas che quai è ina errur, lura a href="%s">contactescha il webmaster ed infurmescha el.

trans-unit.source: Forbidden
trans-unit.target: Scumandà

trans-unit.source: You are either not authenticated or you are not allowed to access the requested page.
trans-unit.target: Ti n'es betg s'annunzià u betg autorisà dad acceder la pagina dumandada.

trans-unit.source: If you are not logged in, try to go to the top level and look for a login form. If there is no login form or if you are logged in already, contact the webmaster and let him know that there is something wrong.
trans-unit.target: Sche ti n'ès betg annunzià, turna a l'emprim livel e tschertga in formular da s'annunziar. Schi na dat nagin formular da s'annunziar u sche ti es gia annunzià, contactescha il webmaster ed infurmescha el ch'insatge n'è betg correct.
